products.name: Astronaut T-shirt
products.description:
Short sleeve jersey t-shirt in jet black. Slightly oversized fit in a medium weight
cotton. Ribbed crewneck collar. Floating astronaut motive on the chest.
No backprint.

products.name: Astronaut Hoodie
products.description:
Jet Black slightly oversized fit hoodie in a heavy weight jersey cotton. Super soft,
pre-shrunk and piece dyed for the ultimate jersey.
No backprint

products.name: Pants V1
products.description:
Cargo pant in matte Black nylon.
Regular fit with a velcro strap adjuster to the leg opening.
Elasticated waistband and cord adjuster.

products.name: Pants V2
products.description:
Cargo pant in matte Black nylon.
Double cargo pockets to the side seams finished with zips.
Elasticated waistband and cord adjuster.
